content: Whirlpool 26 cu ft French-Door Refrigerator with internal water dispenser, stainless steel finish, Energy Star certified, fingerprint-resistant.
LG 5.0 cu ft high-efficiency front-load washer with TurboWash and AI fabric care, graphite steel, allergen cycle.
Panasonic 1.6 cu ft countertop microwave, inverter technology, 1250W, sensor reheat, black stainless.
Bosch 24-inch 500 Series dishwasher, 44 dBA, third rack, AutoAir, stainless steel tub, Energy Star.
Dyson V15 Detect cordless stick vacuum with laser slim fluffy cleaner head, HEPA filtration, up to 60 minutes runtime.
